Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory101.png'}
{3: 'During the two-week feedback period, in addition to Vanessa and yourself, Leonie has managed to recruit quite some people as temporary volunteers.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sica', 3: "Commandant Vanessa... we've had thirty rounds in a row. Can we take a quick break...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vanessa', 3: 'Tired already? Is your Mind Beacon made of thin paper?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: "Your current record stands at 29 losses and 1 win. Win three rounds against me, and I'll grant you a half-hour break.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sica', 3: 'Then... may I switch my opponent...? Maybe 【kuroname】 can...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vanessa', 3: 'What did you just say?', 4: '1'}
{2: "Vanessa, don't be too harsh on the junior.", 3: '17'}
{2: 'And... Simon, are you alright?', 3: '18'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Simon', 3: "Y-yes... I'm fine, Chief. I just feel a bit dizzy... and... nauseous...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Simon', 3: 'Sorry, I might... not be quite suited for using this kind of machine...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Harley Jo', 3: 'Simon, did you not know you had holographic vertigo?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Simon', 3: "I had no idea... It wasn't part of the physical check-up...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Beyond that—'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory423.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Damn it! How the hell did I lose to 21?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'No. 21', 3: "Noctis, you're just too weak. This is an effortless victory.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "Hey, WGAA girl, don't you think this game lacks something on the immersion side?", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Vera', 3: "With all these characters being armed to the teeth, wouldn't it be more thrilling and realistic if there were some splattering blood effects when an enemy unit is taken down?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: "Kamui, it's time for training. We should head back.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "Hold on, Cap! Just give me a little more time to play, alright? I'm on a seven-win streak here, and if I can squeeze out just two more victories, I'll double my points!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: '...Leonie, I have a personal suggestion for you. How about designing something like a parental control system to help prevent addiction—', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory584.jpg'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Teddy', 3: "Seriously, how many times have I told you? Your coding habits are just plain atrocious. If it's not necessary, don't even bother adding it. I mean, are you planning on making the code rhyme or something?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Leonie', 3: 'Computer language is still a language, and the ultimate pursuit of any language is to seek beauty!', 4: '1'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Teddy', 3: "This statement absolutely deserves a prime spot on the engine's startup screen. When this mess turns into a steaming pile of code shit after a few years of iteration, hopefully, your great quote will be right there to provide comfort to future programmers.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory526.jpg'}
{3: 'All in all, a lot has happened.'}
{3: "And today marks your last day as Hamlet Gen-2's tester."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Nanami initiating intervention!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Hehe, surprise! The final boss is none other than yours truly, Nanami!', 4: '1'}
{2: "Where's Vanessa?", 3: '61'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Leonie', 3: "Seems like she got caught up with something at the Engineering Force, so she won't be around for the whole day.", 4: '1'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Don't underestimate Nanami's power, Commandant. I've completed all the hidden missions and unlocked all the special units. You might be strong, but remember, it's not just about the stats of the virtual avatar.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Leonie', 3: "You say whatever you want, but I've poured my heart and soul into BLACK★ROCK SHOOTER. She won't go down that easily!", 4: '1'}
{2: '...Does anyone still remember our original objective was to find bugs?'}
